label: Spark PageRank Example
description: The example Spark PageRank application. The input for this example is a Stream of url pairs, representing links between pages. A workflow of Spark and MapReduce runs to read that data and generate the page rank model. A Service is used to output ranks for different urls based on the trained model.
author: Cask

arguments.name: description
arguments.value: Stream of URL pairs representing links between pages
